title: Hear the piano thought to be too perfect by Beethoven
description: To find out what made Nannette Streicher's pianos so special, World Cafe visited the Museum of Science and Technology in Vienna, where a couple of her pianos still survive.
itunes:title: Hear the piano thought to be too perfect by Beethoven
itunes:author: Raina Douris
itunes:summary: World Cafe visited the Museum of Science and Technology in Vienna, where a couple of Nannette Streicher's pianos still survive.
itunes:subtitle: World Cafe visited the Museum of Science and Technology in Vienna, where a couple of Nannette Streicher's pianos still survive.
